original_title: อินเดียน่า โจ๋ย ตอน สุสานช้าง
overview: Very loosely based on a true story of Thai adventurer/photographer Joai Bangchark. After fleeing animal poachers, Joai receives a necklace made of elephant tusk from a dying man in the forest. The necklace can apparently control the actions of elephants. Using the necklace, he must thwart a band of evil animal poachers and save a local village, with the help of the ghost of a baby elephant.
title: Indiana Joai: Elephant Cemetary
